subject: Ski Jumping
lead_paragraph: Thomas Morgenstern of Austria won a World Cup ski jumping meet in Liberec, Czech Republic, his third consecutive victory and his 10th of the season. He jumped 132.0 and 128.5 meters for a total of 272.4 points. Morgenstern improved his lead in the overall World Cup standings to 1,555 points. Gregor Schlierenzauer of Austria was second with jumps of 130.5 and 129 meters. Andreas Kuettel of Switzerland was third.
